headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.tradingview.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.tradingview.com https://discord.com https://*.discord.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.tradingview.com https://discord.com https://*.discord.com https://cdn.discordapp.com; style-src 'self'; font-src 'self' data:; frame-src https://*.tradingview.com https://discord.com https://*.discord.com; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests
